name: NEOnDemandRule
desc: A base class shared by all VPN On Demand rules.

items.name: var dnsSearchDomainMatch: [String]?
items.desc: DNS search domains that identify a network.

items.name: var dnsServerAddressMatch: [String]?
items.desc: DNS server addresses that identify a network.

items.name: var interfaceTypeMatch: NEOnDemandRuleInterfaceType
items.desc: An interface type to identify a network.

items.name: var probeURL: URL?
items.desc: A URL to probe when all other network identifiers match to validate that an expected resource is available.

items.name: var action: NEOnDemandRuleAction
items.desc: The action of the On Demand Rule.
